gGnome 0.1
  • Reference

    Rcplex2

    internal.Rd

    Modification of Rcplex which takes in mipcontrol parameters.

    Call simple events in gGraph

    Rcplex2(
  cvec,
  Amat,
  bvec,
  Qmat = NULL,
  lb = 0,
  ub = Inf,
  control = list(),
  objsense = c("min", "max"),
  sense = "L",
  vtype = NULL,
  n = 1,
  tuning = FALSE
)

simple(
  gg,
  reciprocal.thresh = 10000,
  tra.pad = 1e+06,
  mark = TRUE,
  mark.col = "purple"
)

    Arguments

    gg

    gGraph, must have 'cn' node and edge annotation

    mark

    logical flag specifying whether to mark fold backs (TRUE)

    mark.col

    character specifying colors to mark graph with ('purple')

    min.foldbacks

    minimal number of foldbacks that makes a bfb

    amp.thresh

    amplification threshold for a BFB

    cn.bfb

    minimal number of copies that the highest copy foldback in the bfb needs to have

    Value

    gGraph object containing labeling the putative event

    Contents

    Developed by Xiaotong Yao, Marcin Imielinski.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.6.
